response.overview: The grindhouses of NYC's Times Square have been torn down, but their memory lives on in Grindhouse Horrors. Grindhouse Horrors is over 100 minutes of theatrical previews from over 40 of the sleaziest, sexiest, and most bloodthirsty features that ever played the deuce. Transferred at SP speed directly from 35mm masters in full stereophonic sound, Grindhouse Horrors will amaze and delight lovers of the offbeat and unusual.
response.title: Grindhouse Horrors
